article_title: HDL's Tonya Mallory says she is prepared for defense if Feds pursue case
article_text:

og.description: Mallory, who abruptly resigned from HDL in September and is now working for her brother’s business in Crewe, said in an interview last week that she is prepared to have her day in court.
